entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023
